name: Chou-Denki Card Battle: Youfu Makai - Kikuchi Shuugyou
overview: Best-selling author, Hideyuki Kikuchi, recreates the world of his best-selling fantasy world in card battles. The game recreates Kikuchi's unique worldview and story in the game's scenario, and allows players to enjoy a tense card battle game on top of that. Depending on the cards you have in your hand, the storyline itself can take you in a variety of directions.
